attributes.action: Stop Foreign Attacks on Pakistani Soil.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
-We urge to stop all foreign attacks on Pakistani Soil.

-There is a need to address the issue of extremism by means of dialogue rather than "drone" attacks.

-Start investigations into "collateral damage" caused by these attacks and give a voice to families of innocent victims.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
